original_text: At evening time, the men went towards the Syrian army's camp. When they reached the edge of the camp, they saw that there was nobody there!
korean_text: 아람 진으로 가려 하여 해 질 무렵에 일어나 아람 진영 끝에 이르러서 본즉 그 곳에 한 사람도 없으니

sentences.original_text: the men went towards the Syrian army's camp
When they reached the edge of the camp
they saw that there was nobody there
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그곳에 아무도 없는 것을 보았다
